title: Learning Motivation Design Strategies to Prevent Dropout in Online Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical competencies required for designing socially contextualized curricula for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Identify three or more dropout risk intervals by analyzing learners' online education participation patterns
The diagnostic tool for 'Course Wall' can be applied to real-world scenarios using the Learning Motivation Index (M)
Based on diagnostic results, a course improvement plan can be designed to enhance learner engagement by over 20%
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
